Name: PRIMAFLOOWS
About the game: The player controls a platform that can be moved from one wall to another, placing it under the ball, preventing it from falling. Hitting a brick with a ball causes a complete brick to collapse. After all the bricks at a given level are destroyed, a transition to the next level takes place with a new set of bricks in a large number. There is also some variety: you need to hit certain bricks several times, sometimes enemies appear that prevent you from going further. - 15 unique interesting levels - exciting simple; electronic gameplay - cool music from KullerSreemm17 - unusual design from Oooli
